== Event : EventENIG11.11 ==
=== 1. Introduction ===
     {*} Ubuntu and free software Day in <nowiki>[[http://www.enig.rnu.tn/|ENIG]]</nowiki>, the event was prepared by the club<nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/clubGCR|Communications et Réseaux]]</nowiki>.

     {*} The event contained three conferences and install party.

=== 2. Event context ===
     {*} Venue :  <nowiki>[[http://www.enig.rnu.tn/|ENIG]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
     {*} Date :Saturday, November 19, 2011 & Sunday, November 20, 2011 <<BR>>
     {*} Time :Day one and a half<<BR>>
     {*} Organizer : <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/clubGCR|Club Communication and Network]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
     {*} Target public : Student of ENIG <<BR>>
